name: ServiceNow-CICD-App-Publish
description: Installs the specified application from the application repository onto the local instance
author: ServiceNow

inputs.name: scope
inputs.label: Scope
inputs.helpMarkDown: Required if sys_id is not specified. The scope of the application. You can locate this value in the scope field in the Custom Application [sys_app] table.

inputs.name: sysId
inputs.label: sys_id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Required if scope is not specified. The sys_id of the application to store in the repository. You can locate this value in the Sys ID field in the Custom Application [sys_app] table.

inputs.name: versionFormat
inputs.label: Version type

options.exact: Use exact version from field below
options.template: Use x.y.z version where x.y is entered in field below and z is autogenerated
options.detect: Try to detect version from sources. Will fail if no sources found
options.autodetect: Detect currently installed version and increment it

inputs.helpMarkDown: Select corresponding option to get the version detection strategy.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version under which to store the application.

inputs.name: versionTemplate
inputs.label: Version template ( like 2.4 )
inputs.helpMarkDown: Major and minor versions, delimited by dot. Patch version will be generated automatically.

inputs.name: devNotes
inputs.label: Developer notes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Developer notes to store with the application.
